text: Loving Annabelle is a 2006 American romantic drama movie. It is about a girl named Annabelle Tillman. She is sent to a Catholic boarding school after she was kicked out of two other schools. She has a lesbian relationship with one of her teachers. This movie was released in March 2006. == Other websites == * Category:2006 LGBT movies Category:2006 romantic drama movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:2000s English-language movies Category:LGBT drama movies Category:LGBT romance movies Category:American independent movies
title: Loving Annabelle
